title: Traffic laws apply to persons driving mopeds
context: [§291-13] Traffic laws apply to persons driving mopeds. Every person driving a moped upon a roadway shall be granted all of the rights and shall be subject to all of the duties applicable to the driver of a vehicle under this chapter except as to the special provisions of this part and except as to those provisions of this chapter which by their nature can have no application. [L 1981, c 24, §1] Cross References Special rules for mopeds, see §§291C-191 to 207.
